description: This section provides a quick look at the various video types and styles I create. From dynamic drone footage to intimate interview setups, these samples demonstrate versatility in video production and my ability to adapt to different project requirements and target audiences.

why.title: Real Estate/Drone Video
why.text: Showcases aerial cinematography skills and property marketing expertise

why.title: Action Sports Hype Promo
why.text: Demonstrates high-energy editing, motion graphics, and promotional video creation

why.title: Corporate Talking Head/Interview
why.text: Shows professional interview setup, lighting, and conversational video editing

why.title: Video & Audio Recording Sample
why.text: Highlights technical audio/video production skills and multi-camera coordination

why.title: Artist/Content Creator Promo
why.text: Displays creative storytelling and brand-building video production

finalInfo.label: Purpose
finalInfo.value: To quickly demonstrate range and adaptability across different video production needs.
